UNIQLO App Redesign

Feburary 2021


I worked as a retail assistant at UNIQLO for a couple years and I was able to observe how consumers used the app and the difficulties they experienced while using their shopping and membership services. Using these observations, I have redesigned the app.
Landing page
Home screen
Search page
Profile - Coupons page (logged in)
Profile - Coupons page (not logged in)
Profile - Purchase history
Saved items
Bag
Search - Category: Tops
Product - Size and Colour not selected
Product - Size and Colour selected

A common observation I made was the difficulty customers had when attempting to sign-up. Despite this being paramount to increasing customer loyalty, many customers felt frustrated with the lack of feedback between the steps and the lack of confirmation when the sign-up process was completed. I have designed a simpler sign-up process to address this issue.
); } export default UniqloPage;
